introduction: SYNOPSISKang Dae-wung who is the descendent of a fallen dignitary is in danger of being accused for murder because of Choi Bu-ja, a rich man born of a lower class. But he is helped out by Mr. Kim, a former government official. He begins to work for Mr. Hwang who is Mr. Kim's daughter Ok-sun's father-in-law. Although he gains Hwang's respect, he ends up falling in love with Ok-sun. When their relationship is revealed, Hwang orders Dae-wung to be executed and tells Ok-sun to remain at her father's home for a while. On her way to her father's home, Ok-sun runs into Hwang who has brought Dae-wung out. Thanks to Hwang's generosity, the two lovers are reunited in tears of gratitude, free to leave together.故事崩溃绅gangdaeung的后裔要被控串谋谋杀碰不得choebuja提醒头发与前二万亿钱帕恩·基姆daegam的帮助危机中的一个。Gangdaeung蜗居中的硫daegam yeosik克西翁·基姆daegam诗歌之间的房子，总计接收凭证。大雄和okseon会爱上并透露一个事实，即一方是硫daegam daeno。黄daegam是留，然后okseon吩咐死刑前大雄暂时。Okseon是由前遭遇领导与父亲偷偷youngmaru拿出一大雄。大雄和硫daegam的口径okseon离开路面在喜悦的泪水。
